full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Outdoor Hazardous Chemical Storage Buildings**
**Revised Solicitation Number: WS4261720612**
**Closing Date: November 1, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the procurement of seven (7) pre-fabricated outdoor hazardous chemical storage buildings for the 4th Canadian Division Training Centre (4 CDTC). The facilities will store and secure various quantities of assorted hazardous chemicals in support of Canadian Army training courses.

**Solicitation Description:**
This bid solicitation supersedes the previous solicitation, WS4007315664, with a closing date of July 12, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders who submitted proposals in the previous solicitation. The amended closing time is November 1, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Late bids will not be accepted, and all supporting documentation must be submitted by the closing date.

**Buyer Information:**
Stork, Terri (SPAC/PSPC) can be contacted at terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries related to this solicitation.

**Notice URL:**
Please refer to the following URL for more information: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17745755?extsite=MTc3NDU3NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Specification Category:**
(95141700) Prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings and structures

**Procurement Category:**
Government of Canada (GD)

**Tender Status:**
This solicitation has expired, and bids are no longer being accepted.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Language of the Tender:**
Both English and French are accepted.

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (RFP) under the competitive open-bidding procurement method.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.

Government of Canada | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
